data.text: @MCHDPIO Don’t risk our children’s lives. Is Moreno going to sit back and watch or do something?

@rpelc @MCHDPIO Please continue masks in schools. Dropping masks in school and having everyone travel (not us) during spring break coming back to classrooms with no masks! Why are we risking their health? You are tweeting about long COVID @WrightScribe @supervisoraskew @SupervisorAlejo

@MCHDPIO Thank you, #LongCovid is awful & now we know even vaxxed kids are susceptible and local schools will not require masks unless they're req'd by @MCHDPIO. Will you do the right thing and require K-12 masking when we're in high tier to protect kids from long-term effects of covid?
